channel.title: Linux Reader
channel.description: I’m David, I spin poi, read books, tinker, and write. Check out what I am doing Now! I started keeping summaries, notes, and reviews of books that I am reading. Let’s Chat! I reply to every email. Here are the current areas of content you can find here: Linux Stuff Tools Networking Writing <— You can also click the links in the side bar.

item.title: Cyber Security
item.description: Security Enhanced Linux The Linux Firewall

item.title: Networking
item.description: Cisco to Juniper Cheat Sheet consoling_in_to_mx80_from_linux DNS and Time Synchronization How to Study for the CCNA Exam Juniper CLI Basics Junos Fundementals Networking Network Devices and Network Connections Paste Config on a Juniper Switch Resources for Passing CCNA Toggle PoE on a Juniper Switch What to Learn After CCNA The formatting and images of all of my networking notes go destroyed when migrating away from OneNote. But they still come in handy all of the time.
